metadata.Title: CVE-2012-2367 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.Description:
Moodle 1.9.x before 1.9.18, 2.0.x before 2.0.9, 2.1.x before 2.1.6, and2.2.x before 2.2.3 allows remote authenticated users to bypass themoodle/calendar:manageownentries capability requirement and add a calendarentry via a New Entry action.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2012-2367` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

moodle - 2.5.4-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: moodle package in xenial, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.4-1ubuntu1').
